mapper.select: select dr.task_id, dr.bridge_id positionId, b.stake_or_truss_number position, dr.disease_id, d.name disease from t_disease_record dr LEFT JOIN t_component c on dr.component_id = c.id LEFT JOIN t_component cc on cc.id = c.parent_id LEFT JOIN t_bridge b on dr.bridge_id = b.id LEFT JOIN t_disease d on dr.disease_id = d.id where (dr.task_id,dr.component_id,dr.bridge_id) = (#{taskId},#{componentId},#{positionId}) and dr.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY component_id,bridge_id,disease_id

SELECT da.`name`, dr.content, da.`value`, da.id disease_attribute_id, dr.type, da.unit from soms.t_disease_record dr left join soms.t_disease_attribute da on dr.disease_attribute_id = da.id where (dr.task_id,dr.component_id,dr.bridge_id,dr.disease_id) = (#{taskId},#{componentId},#{positionId},#{diseaseId}) and dr.is_deleted = 0
